elements.title: Geo together
elements.description: Geo (green energy options) together: wire clamps, controlled sockets, thermostats, solar (mentioned in the solar/battery section by Ikea, indicates when to switch on/off appliances), consumer + business. Awarded phase 2 of UK gov [2020 SENS competition](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/smart-energy-savings-sens-competition)

elements.title: Power X
elements.description: PowerXâ€™s suite of smart home solutions provides a unified view of all energy, devices and water outlets running in your home through one, easy-to-use app. Received $4M in April 21 from Spring Tide, Antler and others. [In the news](https://news.crunchbase.com/news/powerx-supercharges-home-utilities-with-4m-seed-round/)

elements.title: Glow
elements.description: Smart energy indicator glows to show real-time energy usage. Magneto-resistive technology wirelessly measures power usage

elements.title: NILMTK
elements.description: NILMTK Non-Intrusive Load Monitoring (NILM) is the process of estimating the energy consumed by individual appliances given just a whole-house power meter reading. Initially developed by Jack Kelly, co-founder of Openclimatefix

elements.title: voltaware
elements.description: voltaware  Energy monitor, very rudimental website, not clear if they have a device

elements.title: watty
elements.description: watty  Monitor, mainly a mobile app? Based in Sweden, Not sure how it works

elements.title: Open energy monitor
elements.description: Open energy monitor  Open source home energy / solar / heat pump / EV charging monitor with their CMS [emocms](https://emoncms.org/)

elements.title: smappee
elements.description: smappee  wire clamps, webapp, claims to disaggregate by appliance

elements.title: sense
elements.description: sense  wire clamps, installed in the fuse box

elements.title: efergy
elements.description: efergy  wire clamps, controlled sockets, webapp
